𒌷 ⋍ 𒀸𒋰𒈫 ≈ 𐎚𐎔 /tp/ tepe tell ᵗalu

𒌷 #ala #alu 𒍇 ulu₃ ville ≈ 𒌨 ḪUL 𒌷 ᵛlu8

𒌷 ≈ 𒋃 ≈ 𒆷 ≈ 𒁕 ≈ 𒀉 ≈ 𒇲 in 𒋢𒌷 kuš ala 𒀀𒆷 a-la 𒀉𒇲 a2-la2 #alû ( a drum ) 鼓 gǔ ᎠᎱᎵ ahuli 𐎚𐎔

𒌷 ⋍ 𒀸𒋰𒈫 ≈ 𐎚𐎔 "drum" /tp/ @ Ugaritic drum < 𐎚.𐎔 tʳpᵘᵐ trumba ጥሩምባ ṭərumba τρομπέτα “trumpet” ☑

𒌷 ᵗURUᵐ 𓉐 port Turm/port / trumpet (бүреэ bori ბუკი)

𒌆 ᵈuru₁₂ 𒋽 ᵈuru₅ דירה dirá דיור diyúr 𒌷 𓈋 dwelling; bedding place; 𒌆 ˡuru₁₂ lair, litter;

𒌷 PURU ≈ 𓉐 in
𒌷𒍢𒀪𒉡 PURU.ṣi-iʾ-nu > Pelusium

𒌷𒅁𒌓 PURU.šap-tú = 𒌷𒉺𒅁𒌓 Pišaptu ( confirming variants! )

𒍎 banšur bench!
𒍂 banšurₓ bench 𐌱𐌹𐌿𐌸𐍃 bʰeg.igi "table"
𒍎 𒌷𒍏 bar.urud board ≈ bord ≈ 𓉐 "bench" @ Irish ☑

Two signs •

Two signs with same semantics but different phonetics and layout!
𒌷 ⋍ 𒆤 saḫ ⋍ 𒍪 ṣú 𒍪 almost indistinguishable in late forms ṣúʳ ZUʳ шагьар šahar
𒌷 ᵀURU

𒌷𒃾𒇻𒊭 ᵀURU Wilusa

𒄒 alal3 𒃺 alal4 •areal "cultivation field district, land" #mēreštu qerbetu Quer-Beet
